story.text: Products by [[Together Soft]]; currently the main one is [[Together Control Center]], an IDE which through the clever use of hidden side information can generate UML diagrams from code and vice versa, and reflect updates in one view into the other. See [[Together Java]], [[Together Jtool]] and various UML-related pages for a discussion of its quality and merits.
